title: Band, 1951-132-6, ca. 1000–1200
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with gauze weave
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Agnes M. O'Donnell
description: Strip of un-dyed cotton cloth with band containing angular scrolls in cloth weave on twined background; guard strips; cord selvage on one side, to which is hand-sewn fringed border.
